charges.charge_description: Counts 1&;2: Did transport an undocumented alien within the United States-8 USC 1324(a)(1)(A)(ii) and 1324(a)(1)(B)(ii). Date of Offense: (each count) 8/20/03. PENALTY: (each count) Not more than 5 years imprisonment, a fine of up to $250,000, up to 3 years SRT, and a $100 Special Assessment. (1-2)

Did unlawfully transport illegal migrants from Mexico, Francisca Salinas-Neri, Manuel Hernandez-Vega and four (4) others by means of a motor vehicle within the Southern District of Texas knowingly or in reckless disregard of the fact that said aliens had come to, entered, or were to remain in the United States in violation of law, and transported or moved said aliens within the United States by means of transportation or otherwise, in furtherance of such violation of law, in violation of Title 8 USC 1324(a)(1)(A)(ii) and Title 18 USC 2. [2:03-m-284]
